QuestData.Title: Meat on the Hook
QuestData.Description: The time has come my friend: Tu'u'gwar must be dealt with!$B$BI've prepped the meat so that the beast is sure to come once you bait the hook I have out in the water. Just follow the fishing line here down to it.$B$BWhatever you do, don't let Tu'u'gwar swallow you whole, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Tu'u'gwar and then return to Tua'kea at Moa'ki Harbor.
QuestData.CompletionText: I thought I might have spotted some thrashing... is Tu'u'gwar dead?
QuestData.RewardText: We shall rejoice at your success, my young friend! There's blood in the water and it is our enemy's!$B$BYou have the eternal gratitude of this old fisherman, and most certainly of all the Kalu'ak once I spread the word!$B$BHere now, I insist, take something as a reward, please.
